questions.question: Can I ask a few questions to help?
questions.name: first_name

questions.question: Since when have you been feeling this way?
questions.name: num_days

questions.question: Is it a physical uneasiness or something emotional?
questions.name: reason

questions.question: Okay, so would you like to talk to a therapist about this? Seeking professional help is normal. I can call a therapist for you if you wish.
questions.name: therapist

questions.question: Alright! I can also call one of your friends for you. Or, you can talk to me, I'm a friend too!
questions.name: friend
